name: Dead Hand Drive
description: Buckle up, check your mirrors and hit the gas in this zombie-infested post-apocalyptic mayhem!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.6ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon 4200 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
